raw_body: VAN DORT – MARGERY EUNICE (nee ATTON). Dearly beloved wife of late Euty Van Dort, darling mother of Everard (US), Basil (Aus) and Benig (US), mother-in-law of Lanka, Trudy and Sharrel, grandmother of Kristina, Amanda, Arlene, Bethany, Trevine, Rebekah and Natalie, great grandmother of Kendall, Kayden, Lacienda and Leonardo, loving sister of Sheila, Barbara,
